pasta.web.controller

Class AssessmentsController

  • java.lang.Object
    • pasta.web.controller.AssessmentsController

  • @Controller
@RequestMapping(value="assessments/")
public class AssessmentsController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller class for Assessment functions.

    Handles mappings of $PASTAUrl$/assessments/...

    Only teaching staff can access this url.

    Since:
    2013-08-15
    Version:
    2.0
    Author:
    Alex Radu

      • viewAssessment

        @RequestMapping(value="{assessmentName}/")
public java.lang.String viewAssessment(@PathVariable(value="assessmentName")
                                             java.lang.String assessmentName,
                                             org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        $PASTAUrl$/assessments/{assessmentName}/ - GET

        View the assessment details.

        If the user has not authenticated: redirect to login. If the user is not a tutor: redirect to home Otherwise: Wrap the weighted containers around all assessment modules (Unit tets, hand marking, competitions ...) Add them to the model for use. Attributes:

        assessmentthe corresponding Assessment
        tutorialByStreamA map of the streams and which tutorials belong to them. Used for releases.
        otherUnitTestsThe weighted unit tests not already associated with this assessment
        otherHandMarkingThe weighted hand marking templates not already associated with this assessment
        otherCompetitionsThe weighted competitions not already associated with this assessment
        unikeythe username of the current logged in user
        JSP:
        • assessment/view/assessment
        Parameters:
        assessmentName - the short name (no whitespace) of the assessment.
        model - the model used to add attributes
        Returns:
        "redirect:/login/" or "redirect:/home/" or "assessment/view/assessment"

      • updateAssessment

        @RequestMapping(value="{assessmentName}/",
                method=POST)
public java.lang.String updateAssessment(@PathVariable(value="assessmentName")
                                               java.lang.String assessmentName,
                                               @ModelAttribute(value="assessment")
                                               Assessment form,
                                               org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result,
                                               org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        $PASTAUrl$/assessments/{assessmentName}/ - POST

        Update an assessment. Only instructors can change an assessment. Tutors can only view.

        If the user has not authenticated: redirect to login. If the user is not a tutor: redirect to home If the user is an instructor, update the assessment by calling AssessmentManager.addAssessment(Assessment) Redirect back to the post version of this page.

        Parameters:
        assessmentName - the short name (no whitespace) of the assessment
        form - the form for updating the assessment
        result - the binding result, used for feedback
        model - the model used
        Returns:
        "redirect:/login/" or "redirect:/home/" or "redirect:."

      • runAssessment

        @RequestMapping(value="{assessmentName}/run/")
public java.lang.String runAssessment(@PathVariable(value="assessmentName")
                                            java.lang.String assessmentName,
                                            javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        $PASTAUrl$/assessments/{assessmentName}/run/

        Schedule the execution of an assessment for all students who have submitted. Only works for instructors.

        If the user has not authenticated: redirect to login. If the user is not a tutor: redirect to home If the user is an instructor, schedule for execution using SubmissionManager.runAssessment(Assessment, java.util.Collection) redirect to the referrer.

        Parameters:
        assessmentName - the name of the assessment
        request - the http request, used for redirection
        Returns:
        "redirect:/login/" or "redirect:/home/" or redirect to referrer

      • viewAllAssessment

        @RequestMapping(value="")
public java.lang.String viewAllAssessment(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        $PASTAUrl$/assessments/

        View the list of all assessments.

        If the user has not authenticated: redirect to login. If the user is not a tutor: redirect to home

        Attributes:

        tutorialByStreamAll tutorials by stream, used for releases from this page
        allAssessmentsAll assessments
        unikeythe user viewing this page.
        JSP:
        • assessment/viewAll/assessment
        Parameters:
        model - the model used
        Returns:
        "redirect:/login/" or "redirect:/home/" or "assessment/viewAll/assessment"

      • newAssessmentAssessment

        @RequestMapping(value="",
                method=POST)
public java.lang.String newAssessmentAssessment(@ModelAttribute(value="assessment")
                                                      Assessment form,
                                                      org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result,
                                                      org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        $PASTAUrl$/assessments/ - POST

        Add a new assessment

        If the user has not authenticated: redirect to login. If the user is not a tutor: redirect to home If the user is an instructor:

        1. Check if the assessment has a name given, if it does reject the form with the reason "Assessment.new.noname".
        2. If the assessment has a name, add one using AssessmentManager.addAssessment(Assessment)
        redirect to the non post version of this page.
        Parameters:
        form - the new assessment form
        result - the result used for giving feedback
        model - the model used
        Returns:
        "redirect:/login/" or "redirect:/home/" or "redirect:."

      • releaseAssessment

        @RequestMapping(value="release/{assessmentName}/",
                method=POST)
public java.lang.String releaseAssessment(@PathVariable(value="assessmentName")
                                                java.lang.String assessmentName,
                                                @ModelAttribute(value="assessmentRelease")
                                                ReleaseForm form,
                                                org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        $PASTAUrl$/assessments/release/{assessmentName}/ - POST

        Release the assessment to some students.

        If the user has not authenticated: redirect to login. If the user is not a tutor: redirect to home If the user is an instructor: release assessment using AssessmentManager.releaseAssessment(String, ReleaseForm). redirect to $PASTAUrl$/assessments/

        Parameters:
        assessmentName - the short name (no whitespace) of the assessment
        form - the release form
        model - the model used
        Returns:
        "redirect:/login/" or "redirect:/home/" or "redirect:../../"

      • deleteAssessment

        @RequestMapping(value="delete/{assessmentName}/")
public java.lang.String deleteAssessment(@PathVariable(value="assessmentName")
                                               java.lang.String assessmentName,
                                               org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        $PASTAUrl$/assessments/delete/{assessmentName}/

        Delete the assessment

        If the user has not authenticated: redirect to login. If the user is not a tutor: redirect to home If the user is an instructor: delete assessment using AssessmentManager.removeAssessment(String). redirect to $PASTAUrl$/assessments/

        Parameters:
        assessmentName - the short name (no whitespace) of the assessment
        model - the model used
        Returns:
        "redirect:/login/" or "redirect:/home/" or "redirect:../../"

      • downloadLatest

        @RequestMapping(value="downloadLatest/{assessmentName}/")
public void downloadLatest(@PathVariable(value="assessmentName")
                                 java.lang.String assessmentName,
                                 org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                 javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
        $PASTAUrl$/assessments/downloadLatest/{assessmentName}/

        Download the latest submissions for a given assessment.

        If the user has not authenticated or is not a tutor: do nothing.

        The http response will contain a zip file with the name $assessmentName$-latest.zip. Within that there will be a set of folders, one for each student that has made a submission with their username as the name of the folder. Within that folder is the code they submitted. When the zip has been downloaded, it will be removed from memory.

        Parameters:
        assessmentName - the short name (no whitespace) for the assessment
        model - the model used (or not used in this case)
        response - the http response that will be used to give the user the correct zip.

      • statisticsForAssessment

        @RequestMapping(value="stats/{assessmentName}/")
public java.lang.String statisticsForAssessment(@PathVariable(value="assessmentName")
                                                      java.lang.String assessmentName,
                                                      org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        $PASTAUrl$/assessments/stats/{assessmentName}/

        Get the statistics for an assessment. Currently only shows a histogram of the number of submissions and a histogram of the marks.

        If the user has not authenticated: redirect to login. If the user is not a tutor: redirect to home

        Build the histogram for marks and number of submissions. The number of submissions is broken up in 10 buckets. Attributes:

        assessmentthe assessment object
        maxBreaksthe number of buckets the mark histogram is broken up in
        markDistributionthe array holding the mark distribution
        submissionDistributionthe array holding the number of submissions distribution
        unikeythe user that is currently logged in
        JSP:
        1. assessment/view/assessmentStats
        Parameters:
        assessmentName - the short name (no whitespace) of the assessment
        model - the model being used.
        Returns:
        "redirect:/login/" or "redirect:/home/" or "assessment/view/assessmentStats"
